sentence.Network_en: A black fox came toward him, carrying a ptarmigan in his mouth.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只黑狐狸朝他走了过来, 嘴里叼着一只松鸡.

sentence.Network_en: But he could not stop, for the mother ptarmigan was running on.
sentence.Network_cn: 不过他不能停下, 因为母松鸡正在向前跑.

...根·弗里曼 (morgan freeman--演员）。就算你打错词根也没问题。“禽类（tarmig）”的第一个建议是“松鸡类（ptarmigan）”， 一个经常被拼错的斗鸡。尽管同音异形字不能被自动拼写完美演绎，它仍然比Word的拼写检查功能好。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Scottish Gaelic tàrmachan. The spelling with p- was introduced later, suggested by Greek words starting with pt-

means.word_mean: 1. large arctic and subarctic grouse with feathered feet and usually white winter plumage
